title: PhilipM44
author: PhilipM44
content: I was recently directed to this website as a legitimate crypto trading platform, and I'm fairly certain it is a scam.  I woman I met online, and have never seen in person, sent me there and is "helping me to invest there."https://seroex.com/app/#/It is less than 40 days in existence, and that's a huge red flag.  Also, the Phoenix AZ address has been used in other scams I believe.  What do you think?

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Without even bothering to open the site, it's clearly a scam exchange from the way you was introduced. I hope you haven't given them your money.Quote from: PhilipM44 on October 27, 2023, 02:19:04 PMthe Phoenix AZ address has been used in other scams I believe.  What do you think?Yeah, there are several fake office addresses that are their default template. If you google it, you'll find several other scam sites with the same appearance.

comments.author: PhilipM44
comments.body: I have sent them about $500, and am requesting it back right now.  There were a couple of "successful trades" that netted about $90, and of course they are asking for $5-10K minimum to earn the big bucks.  Thank you

comments.author: PhilipM44
comments.body: FYI, I did receive my deposit back, so that is good!

comments.author: rat03gopoh
comments.body: Quote from: PhilipM44 on October 27, 2023, 04:13:09 PMFYI, I did receive my deposit back, so that is good!Hell yeah, that's great and you bring a rare story of dealing with a woman on the internet. But, don't expect someone on this forum to use the exchange you're trying to bring.So that this doesn't seem like a bullshit story, what payment method did you use?

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.created_time: October 27, 2023, 11:33:32 PMLast edit: October 27, 2023, 11:53:05 PM by PX-Z
comments.body: Quote from: PhilipM44 on October 27, 2023, 02:19:04 PMIwoman I met online, and have never seen in person, sent me there and is "helping me to invest there."Without seeing its site and looks, or even its whois info, obviously the is a scam knowing that there's a woman asking for help especially in investment lmao.Quote from: PhilipM44 on October 27, 2023, 04:13:09 PMFYI, I did receive my deposit back, so that is good!Now now, it's a different story, shilling an investment site here won't help especially in this forum, so tell that story to other people instead.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.created_time: October 28, 2023, 12:07:13 PMLast edit: October 28, 2023, 01:01:54 PM by Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: PhilipM44 on October 27, 2023, 02:19:04 PMI was recently directed to this website as a legitimate crypto trading platform, and I'm fairly certain it is a scam.  I woman I met online, and have never seen in person, sent me there and is "helping me to invest there."A woman you met online referring you to a website for an investment, this same website is a newly established one that has no track record of anything, we can see that most of the times we often complain about being scammed is actually our own fault, there's no way you can be where you're sitted and someone comes around to inform you that you have been scammed without making any transaction with anyone or leaving your informations open to the public, what we do determine what we see.

comments.author: holydarkness
comments.body: Quote from: PhilipM44 on October 27, 2023, 04:13:09 PMFYI, I did receive my deposit back, so that is good!For now. To lure you into investing more. Once the trap set, it'll snap shut, taking away your fund. Pretty much sure that scenario is well recycled here. And honestly, isn't this too good to be true? 2.6% daily interest? 18.2% weekly?Do you mind to edit your opening post and break that address with space or anything to make it a simple text instead of a link?

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: This smells like the popular pig butchering scam. If you have no idea about, look it up on your search Engine or you can start with post made by @pakhitheboss Beware of Pig Butchering Scam!What surprises me though is you trying to make it appear like the gave you a refund of your money. What is your aim here, OP? If not shilling?

comments.author: dzx789789
comments.created_time: December 01, 2023, 05:37:20 PMLast edit: April 30, 2024, 12:39:43 AM by Mr. Big
comments.body: I also invest in investments similar to this. The income is very stable. Only losers have a lot of negative emotions.  How did you decide it was a scam? How much money did you lose?

comments.author: Mark99999
comments.body: I think most losers only use words to slander

comments.author: acroman08
comments.body: Quote from: Mark99999 on December 17, 2023, 06:46:39 AMI think most losers only use words to slanderQuote from: dzx789789 on December 01, 2023, 06:02:35 PMHow did you decide it was a scam? How much money did you lose?it looks like the website's minions are up and about(at least I think you are, I mean you guys created an account just to post on this particular thread.). I hope you guys realize that the forum members are not as dumb as you might think. any type of scam that is obvious as this will be called out.

comments.author: Bitcoin_Arena
comments.body: Quote from: acroman08 on December 17, 2023, 12:48:56 PMit looks like the website's minions are up and about(at least I think you are, I mean you guys created an account just to post on this particular thread.). I hope you guys realize that the forum members are not as dumb as you might think. any type of scam that is obvious as this will be called out. He is actually the dumb one. His ass is his wasting time here if he thinks he will scam anyone with his fake postive review tactics.Quote from: dzx789789 on December 01, 2023, 05:37:20 PMI also invest in investments similar to this. The income is very stable. Only losers have a lot of negative emotions.  Quote from: dzx789789 on December 01, 2023, 06:02:35 PMHow did you decide it was a scam? How much money did you lose?Quote from: Mark99999 on December 17, 2023, 06:46:39 AMI think most losers only use words to slanderWell done SERO EX scammer, now if you will please, I am going to tag all you sock puppet accounts. Please keep them coming!
